Hide axis
{{{class="brush: R"
par(xaxt='n')
}}}
or
{{{class="brush: R"
plot(...,xaxt='n')
}}}

Show the axis
{{{class="brush: R"
par(xaxt='s')
}}}

Print the x axis
{{{class="brush: R"
axis(1, at=at, labels=labels)
}}}


Example:
{{{class="brush: R"
par(xaxt='n')
plot(1:10)
x = c(1,3,7,10)
par(xaxt='s')
axis(1, at=x, labels=x)
}}}
